headline: Masco Q2 Earnings and Sales Surpass Estimates, Stock Up
summary: MAS rallies 10% pre-market after Q2 EPS and revenue beat estimates, driven by margin gains and plumbing sales growth.

headline: Masco (MAS) Reports Q2 Earnings: What Key Metrics Have to Say
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Masco (MAS) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Masco (MAS) Q2 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
summary: Masco (MAS) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +20.37% and +2.32%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Masco (MAS) Q2 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
raw.summary: Masco (MAS) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +20.37% and +2.32%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Masco’s (NYSE:MAS) Q2 Sales Top Estimates, Stock Jumps 10.6%
summary: Home-building design and manufacturing company Masco Corporation (NYSE:MAS) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, but sales fell by 1.9% year on year to $2.05 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.30 per share was 20% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: Masco’s (NYSE:MAS) Q2 Sales Top Estimates, Stock Jumps 10.6%
raw.summary: Home-building design and manufacturing company Masco Corporation (NYSE:MAS) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, but sales fell by 1.9% year on year to $2.05 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.30 per share was 20% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Masco: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the Livonia, Michigan-based company said it had net income of $1.28. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, came to $1.30 per share. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Masco: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: On a per-share basis, the Livonia, Michigan-based company said it had net income of $1.28. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, came to $1.30 per share. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.

headline: Masco Corporation Reports Second Quarter 2025 Results
summary: LIVONIA, Mich., July 31, 2025--Masco Corporation (NYSE: MAS), one of the world’s leading manufacturers of branded home improvement and building products, reported its second quarter 2025 results.
